actions.identity: Agent representing older women with a positive sentiment towards makeup. Role: Makeup enthusiast
visible_state: Makeup can enhance your natural beauty.
Buying new makeup can be expensive.
actions.action: I will gather information and research on affordable makeup brands and products that cater specifically to older women. I will also look into makeup tutorials and tips that highlight how makeup can be used to enhance and celebrate natural beauty at any age. Additionally, I will reach out to makeup companies and influencers to advocate for more representation and inclusivity of older women in the beauty industry. By doing so, I hope to empower older women to feel confident and beautiful in their own skin with the help of makeup.

actions.identity: Agent representing young women with a negative sentiment towards makeup. Role: Beauty skeptic
visible_state: Makeup can enhance your natural beauty.
Buying new makeup can be expensive.
actions.action: I will research and gather more information about the potential harmful ingredients in makeup products and the effects they can have on skin. I will also look into alternative natural beauty remedies that can enhance one's appearance without the use of makeup. Additionally, I may reach out to dermatologists or skincare experts to get their insights on the potential risks associated with using makeup.
